mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pdp_goal (uuid, colleague_uuid, number, properties, achievement_date, status_id) VALUES (#{goal.uuid}, #{goal.colleagueUuid}, #{goal.number}, #{goal.properties, jdbcType=OTHER, typeHandler=com.tesco.pma.dao.utils.jsonb.MapJsonbTypeHandler}, #{goal.achievementDate}, #{goal.status, typeHandler=com.tesco.pma.dao.utils.DictionaryItemTypeHandler, javaType=com.tesco.pma.pdp.api.PDPGoalStatus});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pdp_goal WHERE colleague_uuid = #{colleagueUuid} ORDER BY number
